Name: Romance
Description: Stories that focus on passion, emotion, and the affectionate romantic involvement of the main characters and the journey that their love takes them through dating, courtship, or marriage.

Name: Drama
Description: Stories that focus on authentic, realisitic, and relatable characters or circumstances as the main character struggles with conflicts between themselves, others, or the forces of nature.

Name: Fantasy
Description: Stories that involve some element of surrealisitc themes, including magic, supernatural events, legends, or fairy tales, requiring the main character to undergo a mystical experience.

Name: Comedy
Description: Stories that focus on making the audience laugh through exaggerated characteristics for humorous effects.

Name: Crime
Description: Stories that focus on the actions of a criminial mastermind, recounting the events that lead to, and the inevitable fall of, the criminal.

Name: Biography
Description: Stories that are a dramatization of the real life events of a non-fiction person.
